tuv.seg: Where to complain about home building or home improvements
Cén áit le gearán a dhéanamh faoi thógáil agus feabhsuithe tí
Here you will find information on the various organisations that deal with trades and professions involved in home building or home improvements in Ireland
Is anseo a bhfaighidh tú eolas ar na heagraíochtaí éagsúla a bhíonn ag plé le ceirdeanna agus gairmeacha atá bainteach i dtógáil tí nó i bhfeabhsuithe tí in Éirinn
Many professions are involved in home improvements and the major ones are listed here
Tá go leor gairmeacha bainteach le feabhsuithe tí agus liostaítear na príomhchinn anseo
Many service suppliers are not members of any trade or professional body and you may not be able to complain to any of these organisations
Ní baill d’aon chomhlacht ceirde nó gairme iad go leor soláthraithe seirbhíse agus seans nach mbeidh tú in ann gearán a dhéanamh le haon cheann de na heagraíochtaí seo

The best way to ensure that you get the service that you are looking for is to follow the advice given in our document Your rights when you buy a service. Consumer contracts are protected by the Sale of Goods and Supply of Services Act, 1980

Is é an bealach is fearr le cinntiú go bhfaigheann tú an tseirbhís a raibh tú ar a lorg ná an chomhairle anseo a ghlacadh.Tá conarthaí tomhaltóirí cosanta ag an Acht um Dhíolachán Earraí agus Soláthar Seirbhísí 1980
If you have a contract with a service supplier you can expect that:
Má tá conradh agat le soláthraí seirbhíse, d’fhéadfá a bheith ag súil leis an méid seo a leanas:
• The supplier has the necessary skill to provide the service
• Go bhfuil na scileanna riachtanacha ag an soláthraí chun an tseirbhís a sholáthar
• The service will be provided with proper care and diligence
• Go soláthrófar an tseirbhís le cúram cuí agus le díograis
• The materials used will be sound and that goods supplied with the service will be of merchantable quality
• Go mbeidh na hábhair a úsáidfear ceart agus go mbeidh na hearraí a sholáthraítear leis an tseirbhís ar cháilíocht indíolta
In a service contract, at the very least, you should ensure that you know the price of the service and the time that it will take to complete the agreed work
I gconradh seirbhíse, ba cheart duit a chinntiú , ar a laghad, go bhfuil a fhios agat praghas na seirbhíse agus an méid ama a thógfaidh sé chun an obair chomhaontaithe a chur i gcrích
General Craftsmen and Trades
Ceardaithe Ginearálta agus Ceirdeanna
The National Guild of Master Craftsmen is a representative organisation for trades and professions
Eagraíocht ionadaíoch do cheirdeanna agus do ghairmeacha é Cumann Náisiúnta na Máistircheardaithe
They run a complaints service and will act as an intermediary in a dispute between a consumer and a member of theirs
Reáchtáileann siad seirbhís ghearáin agus imreoidh siad ról an idirghabhálaí i gcomhrac idir tomhaltóir agus ball dá gcuid
The Construction Industry Register Ireland (CIRI) is an official online register of builders, contractors, specialist sub-contractors and tradespersons who undertake to carry out construction works

Is éard is HomeBond ann Scéim Náisiúnta Rathaíochta na Tógála Tí a bhunaigh Cumann an Tionscail Tógála agus Cumann Thógálaithe Baile na hÉireann, i gcomhpháirt leis an Roinn Tithíochta, Pleanála, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil
You can make a formal complaint if a registered member has failed to adhere to CIRI's Code of Ethics. You can read more about making a complaint on the CIRI website
Cinntíonn sé go gcothabháltar na caighdeáin tógála cuíthe agus cosnaíonn sé ceannaitheoirí trí frithgheallúint a dhéanamh ar aon lochtanna struchtúrtha móra

HomeBond, the National House Building Guarantee Scheme, is a scheme established by the Construction Industry Federation and the Irish Home Builders Association, in conjunction with the Department of the Housing, Planning, Community and Local Government
Tá scéim ghearáin ag HomeBond le haghaidh lochtanna neamhstruchtúrtha i dtithe nua, ag teacht chun solais laistigh de bhliain tar éis duit an teach a cheannacht
It ensures that proper building standards are maintained and protects purchasers by underwriting any major structural defects in new homes
I measc lochtanna neamhstruchtúrtha a chlúdaítear faoin scéim tá pluiméaracht phollta, urláir mhíchothroma, sáruithe ar riachtanais dóiteáin, cuir i gcás aláraim deataigh, agus easpa inslithe
Buyers should check that their particular builder or developer is Homebond registered
Ba cheart do cheannaitheoirí seiceáil an bhfuil a dtógálaí nó forbróir áirithe cláraithe
Further information is available on the Homebond website
Má thagann aon fhadhb i gceist, ba cheart don cheannaitheoir fógra a thabhairt don tógálaí i scríbhinn
Homebond can be contacted by email: info@homebond.ie or by telephone 1850 306 300
Is féidir dul i dteagmháil le HomeBond tríd an ríomhphost: headoffice@homebond.ie nó ar an teileafón ag 1850 306 300
The Pyrite Resolution Board has set up a scheme for the remediation of significant damage to dwellings caused by pyritic heave
Tá scéim á cur ar bun ag an mBord Réitigh Phiríte i dtaca le hath-idirghabháil damáiste shuntasaigh d’áitribh a bhfuil aistriú piríteach ina chúis leis
This damage can occur when there is pyrite in the hardcore material used
Féadfaidh an damáiste seo tarlú nuair is í pirít an miotal crua a úsáidtear
You can get more information about the scheme and apply for it online at pyriteboard.ie
Féadfaidh tú tuilleadh eolais a fháil agus iarratas a dhéanamh ar líne ar pyriteboard.ie
The Royal Institute of the Architects of Ireland aims to protect the public by insisting on high standards of professional conduct and admitting only properly examined members
Tá sé mar aidhm ag Institiúid Ríoga Ailtirí na hÉireann an pobal a chosaint trí ardchaighdeáin d’iompar gairmiúil a éileamh agus iad ag ligean isteach ball nuair atá scrúdú ceart déanta orthu
The Institute of Professional Auctioneers and Valuers is the representative body for auctioneers
Is é Institiúid Ceantálaithe agus Luachálaithe Gairmiúla na hÉireann an comhlacht iondaíochta do cheantálaithe
It is self-governing and operates a code of practice
Tá sé féinrialaithe agus oibríonn sé cód cleachtais
It has a complaints procedure for members of the public and a compensation fund for cases of misappropriation of clients’ funds
Tá nós imeachta gearáin acu don phobal agus ciste cúitimh le haghaidh cásanna mídhilsithe de mhaoinithe chliaint
You can also make complaints about auctioneers and estate agents to the Property Services Regulatory Authority
Is féidir leat a dhéanamh freisin ar ghearáin faoi ceantálaithe agus gníomhairí eastáit leis an Údarás Seirbhísí Maoine Rialála
The Society of Chartered Surveyors Ireland (SCSI) is the professional body for Chartered Surveyors
Is é Cumann na Suirbhéirí Cairte Éireann (SCSI) an comhlacht gairmiúil do Shuirbhéirí Cairte
Register of Electrical Contractors of Ireland (RECI) is a voluntary self-regulatory body for the electrical contracting industry
Is comhlacht deonach féinrialaithe é Clár Conraitheoirí Leictreacha na hÉireann (RECI) do thionscal conraitheoirí leictreacha

It aims to promote and protect the interests of the public as users of electrical service so that they obtain an acceptable standard of workmanship and technical competence within the electrical contracting industry

Tá sé mar aidhm aige leas an phobail a chur chun cinn agus a chosaint mar úsáideoirí de sheirbhísí leictreachais ionas gur féidir leo caighdeán inghlactha ceardaíochta agus cumas teicniúil a fháil ó thionscal na gconraitheoirí leictreacha
RECI investigates complaints about the standard of work of registered contractors
Fiosraíonn an RECI gearáin maidir le caighdeán oibre na gconraitheoirí cláraithe
Electrical Contractors Safety and Standards Association Ltd. (ECSSA) is a voluntary self-regulatory body for the electrical contracting industry
Is comhlacht deonach féinrialaithe é an Eagraíocht um Shábháilteacht agus Chaighdeáin Conraitheoirí Leictreacha Teoranta do thionscal conraitheoirí leictreacha
It aims to improve the standards of electrical installation work in Ireland by promoting and protecting the interests of the public relating to electrical services
Tá sé mar aidhm aige caighdeáin obair inslithe leictreach a fheabhsú in Éirinn trí leas an phobail maidir le seirbhísí leictreacha a chur chun cinn agus a fhorbairt
A complaint about an ECSSA member will be investigated by an ECSSA Inspector
Déanfar fiosrú ar ghearán faoi ball den ECSSA ag cigire den ECSSA
Institution of Engineers of Ireland is the regulatory organisation for professional engineering in Ireland
Is é Institiúid Innealtóirí na hÉireann an eagraíocht rialaithe d’innealtóireacht ghairmiúil in Éirinn
One of its aims is to maintain standards of professional ethics and conduct
Is í ceann de na haidhmeanna atá aige ná caighdeáin na heitice agus an iompair ghairmiúil a chothabháil
Currently there are no representative bodies for plumbers
Níl aon chomhlacht iondaíochta ann do phluiméaraí faoi láthair
However, if you are installing or working on a gas heating system or cooker it is important for your safety that you get a competent gas installer
Mar sin féin, má tá tú ag cur isteach nó ag obair ar chóras téimh gáis nó cócaire gáis tá sé tábhachtach ar son do shábháilteachta go bhfaigheann tú duine maith cumasach len é a chur isteach duit
Bord Gáis, as part of a safety assurance programme, maintains a list of competent gas installers
Mar chuid de chlár dearbhaithe cáilíochta, cothabhálann Bord Gáis liosta de shuiteálaithe maithe gáis
Irish Standards exist (I.S
Is ann do Chaighdeáin Éireannacha (I.S
820) to protect you from sub standard work, which, in the case of gas equipment installation or repair, could be deadly
820) chun tú féin a chosaint ó obair faoi bhun an chaighdeáin, rud a d’fhéadfadh a bheith marfach i gcás shuiteáil nó deisiúchán trealaimh gáis
You can find a Registered Gas Installer in your area here
Is féidir leat Suiteálaí Gáis Cláraithe i do cheantar a aimsiú anseo
